fullDescription.intro: Pads the layer input with zeros in a single dimension. Corresponds to the Keras Zero-Padding 1D Layer.

tab.name: Options
tab.option: The name prefix of the layer. The prefix is complemented by an index suffix to obtain a unique layer name. If this option is unchecked, the name prefix is derived from the layer type.
A tuple of two integers. How many zeros to add at the beginning and at the end of the padding dimension.

ports.inPort: The Keras deep learning network to which to add a Zero-Padding 1D layer.
ports.outPort: The Keras deep learning network with an added Zero-Padding 1D layer.
